messages.message:
Hey team, I'm having an issue with my crafting server. Right now `cs update`  is running and it's stuck on kubernetes. In addition, I think most of the daemons are down as well. Is there a way to restart all the daemons? just before this i just pulled a new branch, did `cs stop` and `cs start` but I'm not sure if that builds and restarts everything

Could someone take a look at my server (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/sayanbhattacharjee1?cw=dev) to see what steps need to be taken?
